verses.1: “Leitungah mihing in nasep haksa nei a, ama hun pen nasem pa-aʼ bang hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.2: Sila nasemte in niliim lunggulhin nasem pa in a thaman a ngak tawh kibang hi lo ahi hiam?
verses.3: A mawkna-in kha tampi sung ka om a, zan thapai-in lungkhamna bek keima tanh ahi hi.
verses.4: Nitak ka lup ciangin, ‘Cik ciangin khua hong vakin zing ka tho tam,’ ka ci hi. Ahi zongin zan sau a, zingsang khuavak mateng ka kigawigawi hi.
verses.5: Ka pumpi tung khempeuh ah than bekbek kidim a, ka vun tung khempeuh meima in tuamcip hi.
verses.6: Ka hunte siamganteʼ siam ciangtang sangin manlang zaw a, lametna om loin a mong tung pak hi.
verses.7: “Pasian aw, ka nuntakna husan bang bek ahihna hong phawk in. Ka mit in hun nuam mukik ngei nawn lo ding hi.
verses.8: Kei hong mu ngei pa in kei hong mukik nawn lo dinga, na hong et laitak mahin ka mangthang ding hi.
verses.9: Meiilum kaite bei-in a manthan bangin Leinuai a pai suk pa mangthang ding hi.
verses.10: Ama inn ah hong ciahkik nawn lo dinga, ama omna ngei mun in amah thei nawn lo ding hi.
verses.11: Tua ahih manin pau loin ka om kei ding hi. Ka lungkham manin kam ka pau dinga, ka gim luat manin ka phun ding hi.
verses.12: “Kei a hong cing ding na koih nadingin kei, tuipi ganhing hong sa na hi hiam?
verses.13: Lum leng nuam dinga, ihmu leng phatuam ding hi, ci leng lah,
verses.14: a lauhuai mang nong mansak a, a lauhuai maangmuhna tawh nong lausak hi.
verses.15: Tua ahih manin gui-awk ding ka ut zaw a, hih bang ka thuak sangin ka si nuam zaw hi.
verses.16: Ka lungkham a, ka nungta nuam nawn kei hi. Ka nuntakna pen husan bang hi lel ahih manin hong hici omsak hoh in.
verses.17: “Nang in hih zahin na thupi ngaihsut dingin na lungsimah na ngaihsut dingin
verses.18: zingsang simin gim a pia dingin ama kiangah pai-in amah na ze-et themthum nadingin mihing bang hi lel ahi hiam?
verses.19: Tom kha sung beek hong pelh lo dinga, ka hu beek hong sangsak man lo ding na hi hiam?
verses.20: Mihingte a encik pa aw, a khial ka hih leh zong nangma tungah bang gamta khial ka hi hiam? Bang hangin kei hong ngim a, bang hangin nangma muitum suak zenzen ka hi hiam?
verses.21: Bang hangin ka khialhna hong maisak lo a, ka mawhna hong maisak lo na hi hiam? Tu-in han sungah ka lum dinga, nong zonzon hangin ka na om nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
